Posts.Content: Need help in dealing with this and showing more support when she is in pain and how to talk about it bcause she doesn't like to all the time.
Posts.Title: My mother has breast cancer - it has spread to liver, bones

Posts.Content: Hello donna My mother has breastcancer to the lung and the dr just put her on xeloda and i see you had it too. How did itdo? Did you deal with the side effects if any? And can you please help me be supportive to her and not a pain in the but. I ask alot of questions she seems to be in such pain and i get scared an I know God doen'st give us a spirit of fear. I just would kick for her to get better and back on her feet. the cancer acting up. Please feel free to email me back. she was on other chemo i have to get the names. Kelli
